data.title: Command Hub Task Card UX Cleanup
data.objective: Improve the Task cards so that priority, assignee, and visible fields provide real decision-making value. Hide or simplify fields that are uniform (all P2, all Unassigned) and add clarity about what is shown/filtered.

notes: Today all cards show P2 and Unassigned, which adds no information.
Future implementation should either enforce real priority/assignee usage OR hide these badges.
UI should clearly indicate how many tasks are shown and what filters (test/archived) are applied.
Safe to be executed later by autonomous pipeline once Lovable-style orchestration is in place.
